com.lovo.netCRM.component
类 LovoList<T>

java.lang.Object
  java.awt.Component
      java.awt.Container
          javax.swing.JComponent
              javax.swing.JList
                  com.lovo.netCRM.component.LovoList<T>
所有已实现的接口：
java.awt.image.ImageObserver, java.awt.MenuContainer, java.io.Serializable, javax.accessibility.Accessible, javax.swing.Scrollable
public class LovoList<T>
extends javax.swing.JList

列表框组件
示例：

        public class ManBean {
                        private int id;
                        private String userName;
                        private String sex; 
                        private Date birthday;
                        ……
                        public String toString(){
                                return this.userName;
                        }
                }
                LovoList lovoList = new LovoList(400, 100, 100, 200,this);
                lovoList.setList(list);

                添加点击选项事件


        LovoList lovoList = new LovoList(400, 100, 100, 200,list,this){
                        public void onchange(ManBean t){
                                System.out.println(t.getUserName());
                        }
                };

版本：
1.0
作者：
张成峰
